oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Consultants on atomic energy control for the Department of State
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Interiors
Barnard, Chester I.; Lilienthal, David Eli, 1899-1981; Nichols, Kenneth D., 1907-; Winne, Harry A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From left to right, Harry A. Winne, Vice-President in Charge of Engineering Policy, General Electric Company; David Lilienthal; General Kenneth Nichols, and Chester Barnard, President, New Jersey Bell Telephone Company.
1450-1; 1946; State Dept's Atomic Consultants; L-R Harry A. Winne; David Lilienthal-Chairman; Brig. Gen. K. D. Nichols; Chester I. Barnard
